subject: Translating?
author: lalarutabaga
full_text:
I'm getting voices, but for the life of me I can't translate them.  
I've been listening to the other members' files and reading the 
translations, but while I hear the voices I don't see how the 
translations are arrived at from the voices recorded.  What's the 
secret to translating? Is is something that comes over time?
Thanks for any tips,
Ursula
